display.title: Diamond Ring
display.description:
The starting point for crafting Angel Rings! Who doesn't love Creative flight?

Start with the classic ring and upgrade it from time to time using alloys or materials from other mods. See JEI and this quest line for more types and recipes.

The "Classic" Angel Ring requires player's XP to fly. Angel Ring will drain some XP over time.

Powered Angel Rings need RF to power your flight.
